summary: This is a brief email exchange from August 10, 2019, regarding a discrepancy in inmate count slips at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, where Jeffrey Epstein was held. The sender notes a difference between the 12am count slip (73) and the 12am electronic log (72).

events.title: Inmate Count Discrepancy at MCC
events.description: An email notes a discrepancy between the 12am inmate count slip (73) and the 12am electronic log (72) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 10, 2019, concerning inmate counts at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
It highlights a discrepancy: the 12am count slip recorded 73 inmates, while the 12am electronic log recorded 72.
This communication occurred shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019, making it relevant to investigations into the circumstances surrounding his death.
